title: sometimes i am the dog who catches the car and doesn't know what to do next
content:
I.
ouroboros pup
stray desire
circumambulant lust
drainhole fire

II.
MQ-9 lock-on
lurid lucidity of love
1111-A target, 1111-A victim
O-2B chosen

III.
pleated loyalty
apt for alacrity
trompe l'oeil cracking
& flattery undone

IV.
ouroboros pup
stray desire
circumambulant lust
drainhole fire

V.
MQ-9 lock-on
lurid lucidity of love
1111-A target, 1111-A victim
O-2B chosen

apt for alacrity
trompe l'oeil cracking
& flattery undone.
